attributes.action: Stop the Government spending £900,000 on repainting the prime ministerial plane
attributes.background: Halt plans to repaint the RAF Voyager and divert the public funds to helping vulnerable groups in society during this Covid-19 crisis. The repaint would serve as an empty patriotic gesture at high monetary cost which replaces meaningful action being taken to protect the population in Britain.

rejection.details:
By the time your petition was started, the plane had already been painted. It's not clear what action can be taken now.

You could search the petitions site for a petition asking for support for vulnerable groups.
